title: A Man of Wealth
description: Billionaire Conner Sterling despises one woman, but he’s about to need her help.Conner Sterling is arrogant and brilliant. He runs this city, manipulating every politician like a marionette. His past has made him distrust everyone but his closest friends, the ones who share his darkest secret. And the person he finds the most deceitful is about to offer him a deal he can’t pass up.The granddaughter of a former president, Vivienne Westwood, may have used her connections to start her journalism career, but she’s determined to make a name for herself. The only thing standing in her way is the pretentious bad boy of the city.When these two enemies are forced to work together, they find themselves drawn into an elaborate dark criminal world existing just below the city’s surface. Can they hunt down the person responsible without hurting each other in the process?
author: S.E. Rose
